answers.answer: My doctors referred me to a specialist that helped me get my diet under control. I was told no fruits before noon and none at bedtime. No fruit juices. Plenty of water. 3 carbs for Breakfast 4 for lunch and dinner.

question: Hello im 6 weeks pregnant....and im a diabetic i want to know if anyone has had any good methods for keeping  sugars controlled.!?? Please help me dont want to have to inject me insulin
